PROFESSOR: Recap last night
and give you-- remember what we had for an overview. The first part was that it's
not about the business plan,

it's about planning. That was the first

It's dynamic. And therefore, your plan

down, or put it in slides.

That's the first set of points. The second is the
three Ys-- or sorry,

the second is your goals and

The questions that investors

Why this? Why is this something important? Why now? Why is now the

And why this team? Why is this group of
people the right people? And if they get through
those, the fourth one

is why won't it work? Now, I said that that's
what investors ask,

and that's probably what

the most scarce resource is not
